sectionTitle.title: Y + J = Love And Fiesta
sectionTitle.message: It is with immense joy that we invite you to our wedding. We look forward to seeing you there and sharing this unforgettable moment together. Below you will find some information that might be useful to prepare for your attendance.

sectionRSVP.title: Confirm your attendance
sectionRSVP.message: To help us organize everything in the best way possible, please confirm your attendance by filling out the form below.

sectionCeremony.title: The Ceremony
sectionCeremony.message: The ceremony will take place at the Hélécine town hall starting at 2:00 PM. (see address below)

sectionWelcomeDrink.title: Welcome Drink
sectionWelcomeDrink.message: After the ceremony, a welcome drink will be served at La Ferme du Renard (address below) starting at 3:00 PM.

sectionFestivities.title: The Festivities
sectionFestivities.message: After the ceremony, join us at La Ferme du Renard (address below) from 3:00 PM starting with the welcome drink. This will of course be followed by a lovely dinner and a fun-filled party.

sectionParty.title: The Party
sectionParty.message: The fun-filled party will take place at La Ferme du Renard (address below) starting at 8:00 PM.

sectionGift.title: The Gift
sectionGift.messageParagraph1: For us, your presence and this celebration will be our greatest gift. However, we understand that some of you may still want to spoil us, and although it's not at all necessary, we thank you!
sectionGift.messageParagraph2: We have set up a small wedding registry on Kadolog, the link is just below if you wish.

QandA.a1: For the ceremony, there is parking at the town hall and the school next door with enough space for everyone.
QandA.a2: After the ceremony, La Ferme du Renard also has a parking section that will allow you to park without any worries.

QandA.q: Are there accommodations/guesthouses nearby? I don't want to drive back after the party
QandA.a1: Yes, there are several options. Here's a link to Booking.com showing a list of availabilities in the area.

QandA.a: Absolutely, you can take photos and we will set up something so that everyone can share them if they want.

QandA.q: Will there be a vegetarian menu?
QandA.a: We will do our best to accommodate everyone. Please fill out the RSVP form and let us know about your allergies/dietary preferences to allow us to arrange everything.

QandA.q: Can I bring a plus one?
QandA.a: Please fill out the RSVP form to help us organize everything, we have planned spaces for everyone!
